actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide outpatient dental services and treatment to any veteran who has a service-connected disability rated at 60 per centum or more.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to furnish outpatient dental services to veterans with a 60 percent rated service-connected disability.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide outpatient dental services and treatment to any veteran who has a service-connected disability rated at 60 per centum or more.
